task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: The instructions for using the subtraction feature on the JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: You must have the app installed and opened to subtract numbers.

result.p: The result of the subtraction equation is displayed.

example.p: You need to subtract 2 from 3. The equation is 3-2=1. Press 3. Then select (-). Press 2. Then select (=).
The result 1 appears on the screen.
